globalErrors.GUILD_ONLY: This command cannot be used in DMs.

strings.TITLE: An unknown error has occured.
strings.DESCRIPTION:
We have no clue what this issue may be. Here is the error message we received:
<MESSAGE>
This was automatically reported to us, and we'll make sure to fix it as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience.

strings.TITLE: Hold it!
strings.DESCRIPTION: You will be able to use this <TYPE> in <TIME>...

meta.name: activity
meta.description: Start an activity in a voice channel.

options.name: activity
choices: Chess In The Park - ðŸ’Ž Requires Boosting
Checkers In The Park - ðŸ’Ž Requires Boosting

options.name: channel
options.description: The voice channel to start the activity in

errors.NO_CHANNEL: You need to be in a voice channel, or to choose a voice channel using the `channel` option.
errors.NOT_VOICE: You need to choose a voice channel in order to start an activity!

strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
Click the button below to join <ACTIVITY> in <CHANNEL>.
Note: Activities do not work on mobile and are still being experimented with. Expect bugs and missing features.

meta.name: balance
meta.description: View a user's Purplet balance, or yours.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to view the balance of

strings.LEADERBOARD_DESCRIPTION: <PLACE> out of <TOTAL> people on the global leaderboard

options.name: color
options.description: Color to change your accent color to. Use one of the suggestions or a HEX color.

errors.NO_DISCORD_COLOR: You do not have a Discord profile color to sync from! To set one, edit your Discord User Profile and change your Profile Color.
errors.INVALID_COLOR_NAME: You need to enter a valid or a color name. Use /color list for more info.

strings.EMBED_MANUAL_COLOR: This color will be used across most of CRBT's replies to you, as well as on your profile and info cards, when someone else visits them.
strings.EMBED_SYNC_COLOR: Your Discord profile color will be synced to your CRBT accent color. This color will be used across most of CRBT's replies to you, as well as on your profile and info cards, when someone else visits them

options.name: destination
options.description: Where to send the reminder (leave blank to send reminder by DM).

errors.SUBJECT_MAX_LENGTH: Subject must be 120 characters or less.
errors.PAST: You cannot set a reminder in the past.
errors.INVALID_FORMAT: The time you entered is in an invalid format, or below 0 seconds in the future.
errors.TOO_LONG: You cannot set a reminder for more than 2 years from now.
errors.INVALID_CHANNEL_TYPE: The channel you specified is not a valid text channel.
errors.BOT_MISSING_PERMS: I do not have permission to send messages in this channel.
errors.USER_MISSING_PERMS: You do not have permission to send messages in this channel.
errors.REMINDERS_MAX_LIMIT: You cannot set more than 5 reminders at once.

strings.SUCCESS_DM: You will be reminded by DM
strings.SUBJECT: Subject
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_DM: You will be also reminded by DM.
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_CHANNEL: You will be also reminded in <CHANNEL>, in <SERVER>.

meta.name: ping
meta.description: Ping CRBT. Returns latency and connection info.

errors.NOT_CMD_USER: Only the person who used this command can use this button.

meta.name: profile
meta.description: Get a user's CRBT profile, or yours.

options.name: lookup_name
options.description: Search a profile by their CRBT profile name.

options.name: lookup_discord
options.description: Search a profile by their Discord user ID or name.

errors.NOT_FOUND: Couldn't find a profile with that username. Make sure to use the autocomplete to find profiles!
errors.CAN_ONLY_EDIT_OWN_PROFILE: You can only edit your own profile.

strings.NAME: Name
strings.MODAL_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: A unique name, can only have letters, numbers or spaces.
strings.MODAL_BIO_PLACEHOLDER: Tell us about yourself. CRBTscript tags accepted.
strings.MODAL_WEBSITE_PLACEHOLDER: A link to your website, blog, Twitter...
strings.MODAL_BIRTHDAY_PLACEHOLDER: Your birthday, in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

meta.name: avatar default
meta.description: Get a user's default avatar, or yours if you don't specify one.

options.name: user
options.description: The user to get the avatar of.

options.name: size
options.description: The size of the avatar to get.

options.name: format
options.description: The format of the avatar to get.

strings.EMBED_TITLE: Thanks for inviting <CRBT> to your server!
strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
<CRBT> is now in <SERVERS> servers!
To get started with CRBT, simply type `/` and click its avatar!
For more help and info, visit the **[support server](<DISCORD>)**.

errors.DMS_DISABLED: You must enable your DMs or unblock CRBT in order to bookmark messages.

meta.name: hourly
meta.description: Get a few Purplets every hour.

strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
You have claimed your hourly **<EMOJI> <PURPLETS> Purplets**.
Current streak: **<STREAK>/5**
strings.STREAK: (<STREAK_LEFT> more to go for a bonus!)
strings.EMBED_REMINDER: Click the button below to set yourself a reminder to claim your hourly Purplets again.

meta.name: role-picker new
meta.description: Manually create a new Role Picker, a menu for members to choose roles themselves.

options.name: description
options.description: Describe to your members what your Role Picker is for.

options.name: behavior
options.description: How the Role Picker should behave.

options.name: limit
options.description: How much roles can be selected. Set to 0 for unlimited.

options.name: role
options.description: A role to assign to the member when selected.

meta.name: role-picker preset
meta.description: Create a new Role Picker using one of the presets.

options.name: preset
options.description: A preset to choose from. CRBT will auto create the roles and send a pretty embed.

colors.name: Colors
colors.message: Choose one of the options below to change your displayed name color in the server!

pronouns.name: Pronouns
pronouns.message: Use the options below to select what pronouns you'd like to display on the server!

zodiacSigns.name: Zodiac Signs
zodiacSigns.message: Choose one of the options below to select your zodiac sign!

verification.name: Human Verification
verification.message: Click on the button below to verify your account.

errors.USER_MISSING_PERMS: Only server administrators can create Role Pickers.
errors.BOT_MISSING_PERMS: I need the "Manage Roles" permission in order to create a Role Picker.
errors.ROLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST: Role <ROLE> does not exist or has been removed. Contact an admin to resolve the issue.
errors.ROLES_DO_NOT_EXIST: One or more of the roles you specified do not exist or have been removed. Contact an admin to resolve the issue.
errors.BUTTON_ROLES_ONCE: You can only select this role once, and you can't remove it.

strings.EMBED_FOOTER: Note: CRBT is not affiliated with any of the role names or with server.
strings.GENERIC_SELECTOR_TITLE: Select one or multiple roles by choosing them below.
strings.BUTTON_ROLES_ADD_AGAIN: Select it again to remove it.
strings.BUTTON_ROLES_REMOVE_AGAIN: Select it again to add it.
strings.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: Members will now available to select roles from this menu. To disable it, simply delete the Role Picker message.
